text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump About China.

You were ACTIVELY ENCOURAGING U.S. manufacturers to sell #PPE and ventilators to 🔥CHINA🔥 as late as March.

Your failed leadership cost lives.

#COVID #Biden please!  
https://t.co/UyWYPiGD3Q
